short_description: fastpath function to scale/standardize numeric columns.
long_description: fastpath function to scale/standardize numeric columns.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

input_tables.name: FitTable
input_tables.rDescription: The FitTable input containing scaling parameters generated by TD_ScaleFit
input_tables.description: The FitTable input containing scaling parameters generated by TD_ScaleFit

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: AttributeNameColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table column which contains attribute names (required for sparse input).
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table column which contains attribute names (required for sparse input).

argument_clauses.name: AttributeValueColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table column which contains attribute values (required for sparse input).
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table column which contains attribute values (required for sparse input).
